Comments Now Work On Pi Day

14 Mar 2019

Well, there’s not much of a Pi day celebration (or even mention) on our side of the world.
That’s simply because we go for a DD/MM format rather than peculiar MM/DD format for dates.
So we usually refer to this day as 14/03 rather than 03/14, which is…more bland yes.
There’s a small irony here, in the sense, that the dates for these posts (you can see it below the title of this post) require a YYYY-MM-DD format.

Additionally, I’ve caved into giving an option for comments on all my posts (guidance taken from here). I’m sure this’ll go swimmingly. Pretty sure.
